name: Random Rot Ciphering
content: Uses a key to randomly generate a dictionary then ciphers the input with the generated dictionary.

name: Pi Generator
content: Generates pi based upon the ratio of co-prime vs non-co-prime numbers in a random set being equal to 6/π<sup>2</sup>.

name: Random maze generator
content: Generates a random maze, this is the basis of my A-Level Project.

name: Prime Sieve
content: Uses an implementation of the Sieve of Eratosthenes to generate prime numbers up to a desired value.

name: Little Man Computer
content: Little man computer (LMC) is a simplified version of the Von Neumann architecture often used to teach people about assembly programming.

name: Sorting Algorithms
content: Just implementations of a few sorting algorithms along with a facility to measure how long each takes to sort a list of random elements.

name: Linked List
content: Simply a linked list, although I have further improved this to make it generic I just have not updated it on Github yet.
